summary_comment: Dr. Bryant is highly regarded for her warm and caring approach, making her class exceptionally easy with minimal effort required beyond reading the provided materials. Students appreciate her responsiveness and the flexible asynchronous format. Her genuine interest in student success and inclusivity contributes to a welcoming environment, though the class is noted for its ease and low academic challenge.

Ratings.comment: Dr. Bryant is very sweet and her class was SUPER easy. If you read the textbook and other articles she provides, the weekly quizzes are a breeze and the class is a very easy A.

One of the easiest classes I've ever taken. This class was asynchronous and you were able to work at your own pace, all assignments were due Dec 7th. There were also 3 extra credit surveys. She responded to my emails very quickly.

Professor Bryant was easily the warmest and most caring instructor I've had at OSU. Not only did she genuinely want everyone to succeed, she also wanted every student to have a voice. She remembered everyone's name and wanted every student to feel welcome. Definitely take her class if you're an HDFS major; I'm not even one and I still loved it.
